casebody.data:
Elisha BALLARD, Plaintiff Below, Appellant,
v.
TAKEDA PHARMACEUTICALS AMERICA, INC., Takeda Pharmaceuticals U.S.A., Inc., f/k/a Takeda Pharmaceuticals North America, Inc., Takeda Pharmaceutical Company Limited, and Eli Lilly and Company, Defendants Below, Appellees. No. 361, 2017 Supreme Court of Delaware. Submitted: April 18, 2018
Decided: April 23, 2018

AFFIRMED.
